mapper.update: update s_b_devi_house set device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, farm_id = #{farmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_person = #{modifyPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, device_code, farm_id, house_id, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time from s_b_devi_house where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
